nodes.bodyText: Please add an explicit return; statement to avoid 'empty block' warnings.
This should be added to the 'OPENJ9-RAWBUILD' and 'PANAMA' configurations.
I think this should say 'datasets' instead of 'files'.
nodes.diffHunk:
